Articles.Content:
Just wondering, how come the space center scene hasn't been updated/replaced yet? I mean, the Kerbin texture was updated from that ugly puke-green grass way back in 0.14, and then once again in 0.18, but there's still no visual change in the space center?

Or is it just because the devs are waiting to change it when they introduce the new buildings? (as far as i know, these are just placeholders)

Anyway, thanks for reading, have a nice day!
I agree. I'd love it to look a little more like the real thing.

They've upgraded the launch pad and the runway, so it's probably only a matter of time until they upgrade the rest of KSC. Until then, you can just say that the grass around KSC is more yellow because it constantly gets killed by rocket exhaust and radioactive nuclear engines destroying the DNA of the grass itself

That's an interesting way to think about it . However, I think you misunderstood me. When I said that the space center scene hasn't been updated, I didn't mean the actual space center in-game, I meant the selection screen when you start the game (where you can choose the VAB, SPH, Launchpad, Runway and Tracking Station facilities). Thanks for your thoughts, though.
